location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed in colour on paperDimensions: 215 x 283mm, on sheet 263 x 345mm

mods.abstract: The map shows the whole of Persia with portions of adjacent countries, and indicates the extents of the coverage of each volume of the Gazetteer and Routes of Persia, administrative regions and boundaries, hydrology, and major cities and towns.The map was printed at the Quartermaster General's Department, Intelligence Branch and includes a printing statement which reads 'I. B. Topo. Dy. No. 8,177. Exd. C.J.A., July 1909.'; a hand stamp on the recto reads 'General Staff Library, War Office, 8 Jun 1911'.

name.namePart: Government of India, Quarter Master General's Department, Intelligence Branch
